item.description:
Every Tuesday Is FREE PIZZA DAY at Ardeos

FREE pizza! Buy one pizza and get the second pizza absolutely FREE with the purchase of 2 beverages.

 

Ardeo on Main

Sleek, chic, and modern! Ardeo on Main was designed to combine the feel of Ardeo in a city-like ambiance. The interior is dressed with modern artwork, wall murals, and chic fixtures, giving it the mood of a true Mediterranean bistro. Opened in 2006, the second addition to the Ardeo family has already become a local's hot spot. It continues the Ardeo theme of exceeding expectations with dining value, while upping the action with an urban emphasis. So if you're looking for the same great Mediterranean cuisine in a hip, fashionable setting, Ardeo on Main is the place for you!

 

Truely an inexpensive night out!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll meet you in the bar area wearing my Girls Just Wanna Have Fun pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Pizza & Drinks at Ardeo "On Main" Hyannis
